	Stay up to date with the latest advancements in LLMs, AI tooling, and web technologies.

	Solve unique and first-order problems at a massive scale across web applications
	Applicants should include links to their portfolio in the application.


Method of Application

Full Stack Software Developer Job at Permanent Capital Ventures Limited




        
    

        
        Permanent Capital Ventures Limited - Our client is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Software Developer
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and innovative Full Stack Software Developer to join our Client's team in building the next generation of LLM-powered web applications.
	The ideal candidate should be able to leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) to accelerate development, improve user experience, and create entirely new product capabilities.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Design, develop, and deploy web applications using modern frameworks (e.g., React, Next.js, Django, Node.js, etc.) and Large Language Models(e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, or similar)
	Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code,balancing traditional software engineering with AI-enhanced workflows.
	Stay up to date with the latest advancements in LLMs, AI tooling, and web technologies.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess B.Sc Degree with 3 years work experience.
	Proven experience as afull-stack web developer, ability to build out web applications from start to finish using Large Language Models.
	Strong understanding ofmodern web development frameworksand APIs.
	Demonstrated ability to build and ship production-grade applications.
	Familiarity with integrating third-party APIs (payment gateways, auth systems, data services).
	Curiosity and enthusiasm for working withLLM platforms(OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.).
	Knowledge of DevOps, CI/CD, and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
	Background in product design or UI/UX.
	Must be able to self-regulate and meet development deadlines, typically 2 weeks
	Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to innovate and experiment responsibly.
	Experience working directly with LLM APIs (e.g., prompt engineering, fine-tuning, embeddings).
	Exposure to cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
	Excellent speaking, listening, and presentation skills.
	Manage a portfolio of web applications.
	Be a catalyst to deliver truly disruptive products that are growing rapidly
	Solve unique and first-order problems at a massive scale across web applications
	Applicants should include links to their portfolio in the application.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a link to their portfolio to: johnsonpeterson918@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Sales Executive (Salary Loan / Wealth Management) Job at Rosabon Financial Services




        
    

        
        Rosabon Financial Services (RFS) Limited is an Award winning Rosabon Financial Services is member of the Concept Group is licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN on April 22, 1993, and being a long-standing member of the Equipment Leasing Association of Nigeria (ELAN), the organization has evolved into Nigeria’s leading Non-Banking Financial Intermediary and Equipment Leasing firm focused on niche and general markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive (Salary Loan / Wealth Management)

Job Locations: Lagos, Ondo, Osun & Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Scope and Impact
     

            
    




	The candidate will be tasked with the responsibility of selling various loan products.
	He / She will act as liaison between customers and our financial institution and will help qualified applicants acquire loans in a timely manner.


Job Summary


	The Rosabon Sales Executive is required to collect and prepare all materials needed to process transactions (loans and investments).
	He/ She will also responsible for reviewing loan applications evaluating the potential risks of granting loans to applicants.


Duties and Responsibilities


	Evaluate credit worthiness by processing loan applications and documentation within specified limits
	Interview applicants to determine financial eligibility and feasibility of granting loans
	Determine all applicable ratios and metrics and set up debt payment plans
	Review loan agreements to ensure that they are complete and accurate according to policy
	Update account records, Compute payment schedules and transactions on ERP
	Confer with underwriters to aid in resolving loan application problems.
	Update job knowledge on types of loans and other financial services
	Communicate with clients either to request or to provide information
	Justify decisions (approvals/rejections) and report on them
	Complete loan contracts and counsel clients on policies and restrictions
	Assess customer needs, explore all options and introduce different types of loans
	Develop referral networks, suggest alternate channels and cross-sell products and services to accomplish quotas
	Go the “extra mile” to build trust relationships, customer loyalty and satisfaction throughout the underwriting process
	Operate in compliance with laws and regulations and adhere to lending compliance guidelines
	Deposit mobilization to meet set targets.


Key Performance Indicators


	Meet Set Monthly loan and investment Targets
	Reduced number of Non-Performing loans
	Customer retention rate of minimum 90% across loan and investment products.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree in Finance, Economics or a related field
	Proven working experience as a Loan Officer
	Familiarity with computers and banking applications/software
	Solid understanding of direct/indirect lending products and practices
	Customer satisfaction orientation and sales competencies
	Ability to work in a goal oriented environment and meet set target.


Salary
N90,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

	Customer Relations Management and Marketing functions at Lekki Branch.

	Sustain and improve on Brand reputation.

	Support the actualization of set
	Territory&#39;s Marketing and sales Goals/ Objectives.
	Support lead generation and conversion process to achieve S/N1 above.


Experience and Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, or any Social Sciences field with at least 2/2 from an approved Tertiary Institution.
	A minimum of 1 year of proven experience in Marketing and Customer Relations Management in a corporate environment.
	Generic understanding of the Nigerian ICT Fducation Sector.
	Job Location: Must be Resident in Lekki or Environs.
	Also open to individuals who just recently completed NYSC or looking for PPA.


Core Competencies &amp; Skills


	Must be ICT and Social Media Savvy.
